```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)

dairy = tt_load(2019,5)


clean_cheese <- dairy$clean_cheese
clean_cheese <- clean_cheese %>% rename(year = Year) 

milk_product_facts <- dairy$milk_products_facts


joined <- inner_join(clean_cheese, milk_products_facts, by = "year")
joined <- joined %>% select(2:16, 20:24)
summary(joined)

  
ggplot(clean_cheese) + geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, y=clean_cheese$`Total Natural Cheese`)) + geom_line(aes(x=clean_cheese$year, clean_cheese$`Total Processed Cheese Products`)) 
+ labs(title = "Total Natural CHeeese Production vs. Total Processed Cheese Production", x = "Year", y = "Production(lbs)")
```
